title: Pairwise Metrics and Kernels in Scikit-Learn
description: In this lab, we will explore the sklearn.metrics.pairwise submodule in scikit-learn. This module provides utilities for calculating pairwise distances and affinities between sets of samples.

meta.title: Pairwise Metrics | Scikit-Learn | Python Programming
meta.description: Explore pairwise metrics and kernels in scikit-learn, learn about their definitions, and how to use them in Python programming.
meta.keywords: pairwise metrics, scikit-learn, python programming, distance metrics, kernel functions
